{% set Date = frappe.utils.format_date(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd-MM-yyyy") %} {% set Place = "Chh. Sambhajinagar" %} {% set language = "Marathi" %}
GROUP LOAN AGREEMENT version jan 24
This loan agreement along with its annexures, applications, addendums and schedules (together known as the "Agreement") is executed at the place and on the date mentioned below in favour of TEJRAJ MICRO ASSOCIATION, a company incorporated under the provisions of the Companies Act, 2013 (CIN: U88900MH2023NPL405072),with its Registered Office at Plot No 72, Gat No 130, Arunoday Colony, deolai Chowk, Near Datta Mandir, Chh. Sambahjinagar(Aurangabad),Maharashtra -- 431 001 (hereinafter referred to as "TMA")
BY
The borrower, whose name, address and other details are set out in the Loan Application as provided in the schedule overleaf (hereinafter referred to as "Borrower") The expressions "TMA" and "Borrower" unless repugnant to the context or meaning thereof shall include, in regard to TMA its assigns and successors in interest and in respect of Borrower his/her legal heirs, executors, administrators, representatives etc. "TMA" and "Borrower", where the context so requires, are referred individually as "Party" and collectively as "Parties". The "Terms and Conditions Governing Group Loan Agreement (Micro Banking)" containing 27 Clauses ("the T&C") received by the Borrower from TMA before execution of this Agreement shall also be deemed as part of this Agreement, and the capitalised terms mentioned herein shall have the same meaning assigned to them in the T&C.
Whereas the Borrower has approached TMA for the Borrower's business requirements and on the basis of the Application Form and representation from the Borrower, TMA has agreed to lend and to advance to the Borrower, a Loan on the terms and conditions as set out in the Facility Documents.
NOW, THEREFORE THIS AGREEMENT WITNESSETH AND IT IS HEREBY AGREED BY AND BETWEEN THE PARTIES HERETO AS FOLLOWS:
1. The Borrower is the sole person applying for, accepting, eligible and receiving the Loan under this Agreement.
2. The Loan or Top-Up-Loan may be disbursed by TMA to the Borrower by way of account credit and such disbursement shall be deemed as disbursed on the date the proceeds of the Loan or Top-Up-Loan (as the case be) are actually credited to any account of the Borrower, irrespective of whether the disbursement date and/or date of receipt of credit in the account falls a Public Holiday. The Borrower shall pay Interest on the Loan from the said date and also repay the Loan accordingly. The Borrower is aware and acknowledges that the Interest shall be benchmarked to MCLR or EBLR (as per the prevailing guidelines of TMA) and the actual Interest rate shall be a component of MCLR or EBLR (of appropriate tenure) plus applicable spread. TMA is authorized to revise the rate of Interest in accordance with change in the law and/or regulatory requirements by the regulator applicable to the Loan pertaining to provisioning norms and/or risk weightage or based on the changes in the pricing policy of TMA.
3. The Borrower shall repay the Loan, in PI, comprising of principal and applicable rate of Interest. The charges and expenses incurred by TMA shall be reimbursed by the Borrower forthwith upon TMA incurring the same, and all such charges and expenses not reimbursed shall form part of principal amount under the Loan, and shall be repaid by the Borrower accordingly.
4. The Borrower will repay the Loan in instalments as per the choice opted and as mentioned in the loan card/the schedule overleaf. The Borrower may pre-close the Loan at any time during its subsistence without any additional charges therefor.
5. The Borrower agrees that each of the Representations and Warranties mentioned in the T&C shall be deemed to have repeated by him/her on continuing basis till closure of the Loan.
6. The Parties shall try to settle any dispute, difference, claims through negotiation and conciliation between the Parties inter-se. If no settlement could be arrived within the period of 15 (Fifteen) days, then the dispute shall be referred to arbitration under the provisions of the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, 1996 or any re-enactment thereof to be conducted by a single arbitrator nominated by TMA whose decision shall be final and binding on the Parties. The arbitral proceedings shall be held at Chh.
Sambhajinagar. Any or all disputes arising out of this Agreement shall be subjected to the sole and exclusive jurisdiction of the Civil Courts at Chh. Sambhajinagar, Maharashtra. The Borrower agrees that TMA may, in its absolute discretion commence any legal action or proceedings in any other court, tribunal or other appropriate forum and the Borrower hereby consents to that jurisdiction.
7. The Parties agree that this Agreement shall constitute the basis of valid and binding lender -- borrower relationship between TMA and the Borrower respectively and shall continue to subsist for the period of 3 (Three) months either from the date of termination or full and final repayment of any Loan provided under the terms of this Agreement or any of its schedules / annexures /addendums thereof.
8. TMA shall have rights to place the Loan, along with any accrued Interest under moratorium or any other agreement as it may deem fit on a case to case basis.
9. The Borrower hereby irrevocably authorizes TMA to grant need based restructuring/rescheduling of Loan (by enlarging the tenure or by postponing the mature date of the Loan, and by keeping the PI unaltered) in case TMA is of the view that the Borrower has been affected by natural calamity or national disaster. The Borrower authorizes TMA to consider such restructuring/rescheduling of Loan only at the pure discretion of TMA. If the Loan is restructured/rescheduled in any manner whatsoever, the Borrower shall conduct the Loan account as per the terms and conditions governing such restructure/reschedule. Such restructuring/rescheduling of Loan by TMA shall not constitute any waiver of rights vested on TMA or obligations of the Borrower under the existing Loan. Further, despite such restructuring/rescheduling TMA shall have the right to recover the Outstandings on the existing Loan as per the covenants in this Loan Agreement.
10. The Borrower confirms having received a copy of the T&C, and agrees to be bound by all the conditions and obligations laid down in this Agreement (including the schedule and the T&C).
11. If borrower has availed the credit facility ("Loan") from TEJRAJ MICRO ASSOCIATION, under the Joint Liability Group (JLG) loan program borrower shall be jointly and severally liable to repay the loan along with interest thereon and other charges/ cost/ expenses as specified in the loan application and other related documents (collectively referred as "Loan Document").
12. This Agreement shall be executed in one set and the original shall be held by TMA and a copy thereof shall be retained by Borrower for the record and reference purpose. The Borrower shall get the entries of repayments made by him/her countersigned by the person collecting the repayment amount on behalf of TMA on the schedule appearing on such copy, which will serve as acknowledgement of receipt of repayment amount. The Borrower hereby expressly acknowledges and confirms that he/she has been read over the material details including but not limited to the Loan, the Agreement (including the schedule overleaf) and the T&C, in {{language}} language known to him/her, and he/she has verified, understood and agree and acknowledge and record his/her signatures in token of acceptance of/agreement to the same. IN WITNESS WHEREOF the Parties have signed this Agreement (including the schedule overleaf) in acceptance of all terms and conditions on this {{Date}} at {{Place}}.

html:
{% set Date = frappe.utils.format_date(frappe.utils.nowdate(), "dd-MM-yyyy") %} {% set company = frappe.get_doc("Company", doc.company) %} {% set Place = "Chh. Sambhajinagar" %}
Center Number: {{ company.custom_center_number or "___________________" }}
Date: {{ Date }}

To,

Tejraj Micro Association,

Acting through {{ company.custom_branch or "_________________________"}} Branch

(hereinafter "TMA")

Dear Sir/Madam,

In consideration of the group loan being evaluated by TEJRAJ MICRO ASSOCIATION. (CIN: U88900MH2023NPL405072) (hereinafter "TMA") pursuant to the loan application and customer profile form (including data inputted through any electronic device of TMA) (hereinafter the forms) submitted/being submitted by the herein mentioned borrower(s) and with reference to the information provided through the forms, each one of us hereby solemnly declare, state, confirm and authorise as follows:

1) (Applicable for borrower(s)):

(a) each one of us stands as witness for the other borrower(s) having been sanctioned/having availed loan in their respective names from TMA. (b) i/we have perused/having been explained in the language known to me/us all the fields in the forms, including various declarations contained therein, and l/we am/are aware and acknowledge that the loan application shall be prepared based on the data information inputted therein pursuant to the details orally shared by me/us to the staff of TMA. (c) i/we confirm having read/being explained the terms and conditions governing the loan sought for by me/us, i/we agree to be bound by the same. I/we am/are aware and acknowledge that l/we can have a copy of the said terms and conditions from the branch of TMA by making a specific request. I/we hereby agree that by applying for the loan l/we shall be bound by the said terms and conditions, and l/we irrevocably accept, agree and submit to the same. (d) if anyone among us has availed any group loan and the same is outstanding in the books of TMA, the loan requested for need be disbursed only after closure of such existing loan. If such existing loan is not closed by the respective borrower, TMA is authorised to net-off the dues under such existing loan, from and out of the proceeds of the loan requested for. (e) the loan to be sanctioned will not be used for any purpose other than for which it is sanctioned. (f) each one of us shall be liable to repay to TMA their respective loan, along with principal, interest and other charges, and such repayments shall be made regularly on the respective due dates. In case of default, TMA shall have every right to recall the entire outstanding under the loan along with applicable rate of interest and other charges. (g) except to the extent disclosed to TMA in writing none among us is a director or relative of a director or senior official of TMA or any other bank, and no director or employee of TMA or any other bank or their relative have any substantial interest in the activities carried out by anyone of us. (h) TMA is hereby authorised to disburse proceeds of the loan (after netting-off the dues under existing loan, if any) to our respective bank accounts as per the details provided by each one of us, after deducting the processing fees and insurance premium as applicable. If any of us seeks cancellation of the loan, we shall refund to TMA forthwith the loan amount so transferred. (i) if any information provided through this document does not match with the information already available in the records of TMA, each one of us hereby authorize TMA to update the said information in its records as per the information provided by each one of us through this document.

2) (Applicable for borrower(s)):

If i maintain any savings bank account with TMA, and the same is found dormant at present, i authorize TMA: (a) to convert the savings bank account to inactive/activate by following TMA's processes, (b) link the said saving bank account with my loan account, and (c) disburse the proceeds of the eligible loan amount to the said savings bank account. I affirm that i have been informed about the balance available in the said savings bank account and i confirm correctness of such balance.

3) (Applicable for borrower(s)):

Each one of us solemnly state, declare and undertake that: (a) we have been informed that TMA administers life insurance products through select insurance companies, however it will, under no circumstance, insist anyone of us to avail such insurance coverage. If any one of us wishes to obtain life insurance cover for insuring her/his/spouse's life the same will be done on voluntary basis. At our instance, all of us have been explained/read over the insurance product features, benefits and risk factors, structure of charges, terms and conditions of the insurance products etc. Related to the life insurance products administered by TMA, and each one of us has understood the same. We are fully aware that all matters related to insurance policy (including the insurance premium, eligibility norms, insurance underwriting, issuance of insurance policy, settlement of insurance claims etc.) are subject to terms and conditions of the concerned insurance company. We may pay the applicable premium amount either by depositing with TMA or by authorizing TMA to deduct from and out of the proceeds of the loan, for onward payment to the concerned insurer(s), and we shall get proper receipts therefor; (b) if the loan is eligible for any social welfare scheme or direct benefit transfer scheme of government of india, we shall submit to TMA/uidai our respective aadhaar particulars in the permissible form and also execute requisite further mandate in favour of TMA/UIDAI.

4) (Applicable for borrower(s)):

Each one of us request TMA to: (a) communicate with us through our registered phone number or e-mail ld, our eligibility for any repeat loans and/or additional loans and/or top up loans; (b) negotiate with each one of us (in any mode of communication as deemed appropriate by TMA) the terms and conditions applicable for such repeat loans and/or additional loans and/or top up loans; (c) process the repeat loans and/or additional loans and/or top up loans based on such negotiations; and (d) grant repeat loans and/or additional loans and/or top up loans. Each one of us authorises TMA to record our respective consents, as also the concurrence of each one of us for the applicable terms and conditions, for availing the repeat loans and/or additional loans and/or top up loans in any legally permissible mode (physical or electronic or one way interactive voice response or both way interactive voice response or through recorded synthesised voice or by way of response to sms). Each one of us is aware and acknowledges that there are risks involved in the above mode of communications including the risk that such communication may be intercepted by any person and the same may not be received by the intended recipient. Each one of us agrees that TMA shall not be liable for any loss or damage arising from any such error or delay in any such communication by TMA or its agents, including but not limited to any breach of confidentiality or any pecuniary loss. Each one of us expressly and voluntarily consents for this clause, especially for recording the consent given by each one of us in the above mode.

5) Each one of us hereby expressly authorises TMA to use my/our contact number and e-mail ld in connection with transactional, promotional and service related calls/messages, and also about other loan products.

6) Each one of us hereby expressly authorises TMA to, without notice to me/us, disclose and/or share all the data/information related to any one of us (including personal sensitive data or information that requires a consent under the applicable laws), and/or the loan availed, and/or the defaults (if any) with its subsidiaries/affiliates, third parties engaged by TMA, regulatory and statutory authorities, any other person to (or through) whom TMA assigns or transfers or novates (including by way of refinance or participation) all or any of its rights under the loan, as and when necessary.

7) Household Income:

Each one of us has shared with TMA our respective annual household income through the forms. Each one of us is aware of the directions issued by the reserve bank of india ("Rbi") on regulatory framework for microfinance loans, as per which microfinance loan is defined as a collateral-free loan given to a household having annual household income up to 3,00,000/- (rupees three lakhs only). (the term "Household" Shall mean an individual family unit, i.e., husband, wife and their unmarried children.] each one of us is aware that, loan (if any) sanctioned to each one of us shall be qualified for the benefits as applicable to microfinance loan only if our respective household does not exceed the threshold fixed by RBI.

8) Central KYC:

I/we authorize TMA to upload the details provided hereinabove on the central kyc registry. I/we also authorise TMA to download my/our kyc details from the central kyc registry on the basis of the kyc number submitted by me/us. I/we consent to receive information from central kyc registry through sms/e-mail on the herein mentioned mobile number/e-mail id.

9) Credit Bureau Check:

I/we am/are informed about the guidelines issued by the reserve bank of india on regulatory framework for microfinance loans. I/we am/are aware that, for processing the loan application submitted by the borrower, the household income of the borrower should be assessed. Further, TMA shall have to mandatorily submit information n regarding household income to the credit information companies (CICS). Accordingly, the financial standing of each one of us needs to be assessed by TMA. Hence, for the convenience and benefit of the borrower, TMA is hereby authorised to use the data/information shared by each one of us with TMA for credit bureau enquiries. TMA has informed me/us that, subject to the herein mentioned borrower maintaining healthy financial discipline and satisfying the eligibility norms of TMA,TMA may be able to explore possibilities of granting to the borrower at the pure discretion of TMA other/further loan products of TMA,if i/we give consent to access the database of cics or such other repositories. Therefore, l/we hereby expressly give our respective consent to TMA to access the database of CICs or such other repositories, during subsistence of the loan presently applied for by the borrower as also for a period of 60 (sixty) days from the date of closure of the existing loan (if any) of the borrower, for obtaining my/our borrower, for obtaining credit information, and l/we shall not at any time raise any objection or dispute or claim against TMA or its officials if it accesses the database of CICs or such other repositories for obtaining my/our credit information within the above mentioned period.

10) National Do Not Call Registry ("NDNC")Do Not Disturb ("DND"):

The mobile number and the e-mail address furnished above are in my/our exclusive control. I/we consent to TMA for de-registering my/our contact number in the NDNC and also to deactivate/de-register DND status of my/our contact number. I/we am/are aware that post de-registration of NDNC/DND, i/we may receive a call from TMA to verify the correctness of request. I/we am/are also aware that l/we have the right and option to re-register for DND/NDNC any time at my/discretion, after TMA deactivating/de-registering the DND/NDN status.

Page 1 of 3
11) Usage of Aadhaar Number/Biometric Information:

(For Biometric): I/We voluntaryly give my/our consent to TMA to use my/our Aadhar number and biometic infomation for doing authentication with Unique ldentification Authority of lndia (UIDAI), for establishing my/our identity, in the manner acceptable as per UIDAI guidelines or under any Act or Law in force from time to time, for the purpose of opening account in relation to the loan or processing loan application or instructions with TMA. TMA has informed me/us that my/our Aadhaar number and biometric infomation will not be stored/shared/used by TMA for any other purpose, unless the same is required or permitted submitted by me/us through the aadhaar is true and correct and I/we will not hold TMA responsible in case any incorrect information is provided by me/us. (For physical copy of Aadhaar): I/We hereby declare that I/we have voluntarily submitted my/our Aadhaar card/e-Aadhaar to TMA and request and authorise TMA to use the same as my/our ldentity and/or Address proof.

12) (Applicable for borrower(s)):

(a) I/We have had availed the credit facility ("Loan") from TMA, under the Joint Liability Group (JLG) loan program I/WE shall be jointly and severally liable to repay the loan along with interest thereon and other charges/ cost/ expenses as specified in the loan application and other related documents (collectively referred as "Loan Document"). The interest shall be levied on reducing balance basis. (b)guarantee obligations:- all the borrowers herein jointly and severally, unconditionally and irrevocably guarantee the group loan availed by each and every other borrower of the group under this agreement (group guarantee). Each borrower jointly and severally undertakes to repay the said group loan and hereby confirm have full knowledge of the transaction. All the parties hereby agree to be bound by and bide with the terms and conditions of the agreement all time henceforth. Until the group loan are repaid in full by each of the borrower. No borrower shall be relieved in any manner whatsoever from his/her obligations under this agreement, notwithstanding any pre closure, prepayment or recall of the Group loan. (c) Representation:- All the borrowers jointly and severally represent, warrant and acknowledge to Tejraj Micro Association that : (i) each are individually eligible to contract and that the borrowers is eligible to avail the group loan (ii) the Group loan shall ensure not to be utilized for any illegal, unlawful or immoral purpose our activities. (iii) they shall participate in all the activities of the group and perform the obligation in the manner specified by Tejraj Micro Association for the group. In no event without the prior consent from Tejraj Micro Association shall there be any reconstitution of the group at the sole discretion of the Tejraj Micro Association and with consent of the group members, the group may be reconstituted by adding or relieving any other members of Tejraj Micro Association.

The consent and authorization mentioned herein will be valid up to 6 (Six) months after the date of closure of the existing loan availed by the herein mentioned borrower(s). Unless TMA is notified prior to disbursement in writing, at such stage Loan and/or repeat loan andlor additional loan and/or top up loan is disbursed to each of the herein mentioned borrower, in the manner described in this document, the concerned borrower shall be deemed to have accepted the applicable terms and conditions governing the Loan and/or repeat loan and/or additional loan and/or top up loan and to comply with the same, and each one of us will be expressly stopped from claiming otherwise.

Each and single data/information shared by me/us (including those related to household income, expenditure, land holding, cost of plant and machinery or equipment, loan purpose, loan utilization and all other information given in the Forms) with the staff of TMA is/are true and correct in all respect. I/We also confirm that the data/information are inputted in the Forms in my/our presence and all the data/information are properly and correctly inputted in the appropriate fields in the Forms. Each one of us ls aware and acknowledge that any false/misleading information or suppression of any material fact will result in rejection of loan application (in case TMA finds so prior lo loan sanction) or recall of loan (in case TMA finds so after sanction of loan) and we shall also be liable for suitable other action, under law or otherwise. The mobile numbers and the e-mail addresses furnished above are in the respective exclusive control of each one of us and we shall intimate TMA promptly, in writing, about changes therein. The whole loan transactions referred to herein are with our express consent, permission and are fully within our knowledge. Each one of us shall jointly and severally indemnify and keep indemnified TMA, Its affiliates, successors assigns, officers and employees at all times, from and against all actions, demands, losses, cost and expenses whatsoever which TMA may at any time incur or sustain as a consequences of any negligence/mistake on my/our part or my/our non-compliance of any of the applicable terms and conditions, or because of providing to TMA any incorrect or incomplete information related to me/us.

Each one among us acknowledges that, we have been informed about our right, not to agree to any one of the above mentioned clauses, if we have objections therefor, and affixture of our respective signatures hereunder shall be treated as our agreement to the herein mentioned clauses. Each one of us also acknowledges that we have been informed about my/our right not to sign this document if I/we have disagreement with any clause/declaration discussed herein, and also about my/our right to revoke any or all consents given hereby, after serving due notice upon TMA, This document shall be an integral part of the Forms, and the Forms and this document should be construed accordingly. We request TMA to sanction the loans applied for in the names of each individual borrower mentioned herein.

Each one of us solemnly state and declare that the contents of the Forms and this document have been read over to each of us in the language known to us and we understand, accept and acknowledge the contents of the same.

हम मे से हर एक औपचारिक रूप से यह कहता और घोषणा करता है कि फॉर्म और इस दस्तऐवज की सामग्री को हम में से हर एक को ज्ञात और समझ मे आने वाली भाषा मे पढकर सुनाया गया है और हम इस सामग्री को समज गए है , इसके लिए सहमती देते है और इसे स्वीकार करते है ।

आमच्यापैकी प्रत्येकजण गंभीरपणे सांगतो आणि घोषित करतो की नमुना आणि या दस्तऐवजातील मजकूर आमच्यापैकी प्रत्येकाला ज्ञात असलेल्या भाषेत वाचण्यात आला आहे आणि आम्ही त्यातील मजकूर समजतो, स्वीकारतो आणि मान्य करतो.

html:
TEJRAJ MICRO ASSOCIATION
Declaration and 'Terms and Conditions' Sheet
घोषणापत्र आणि 'नियम आणि अटी' पत्र
Version Jan 2024

1.0 Declaration / घोषणापत्र

Disbursement:- In case the Loan is sanctioned, all fees (including documentation and processing charges or any outstanding loan balance) under or in connection with the loan shall be deducted from the loan amount and only the net amount of the loan after deduction of such fee or charges, outstanding loan balance shall be disbursed to the applicant, unless otherwise advised.

Interest:- The interest will be charged on the principal amount of the Loan advanced and outstanding from time to time, at the rate agreed between the parties and as stated in the loan documents. The interest on the Loan shall be calculated on actual daily balance basis with fortnightly/monthly rest on the basis of days in a year. The interest on the Loan shall begin to accrue from the date of disbursement of the Loan/issuance of loan cheque, irrespective of the time taken for transit, collection, realization of the cheque by the Borrower(s) or his/her bank. The loan amount and interest will be paid in fortnightly/monthly installments and as communicated by TEJRAJ MICRO ASSOCIATION.

The rate of interest shall be determined based on the cost of borrowed funds, matching tenor cost, market liquidity, refinance avenues, offerings by competition, tenure of customer relationship, cost of disbursements (Cost of Fund). In addition to the cost of fund, the rate of interest shall further be determined based on inherent credit and default risk in the products and customer per se arising from customer segment, profile of the customers, professional qualification, stability in earning and employment and repayment ability, overall customer yield, risk premium, nature and value of primary and collateral securities, past repayment track record of the customers, external ratings of the customers, industry trends etc. The company may adopt interest rate model whereby the rate of interest of same product and tenor availed during same period by different customers need not be standardized. It could vary for different customers depending upon consideration of any or combination of above factors.

  1. I/We certify that the information furnished above and documents provided are true & accurate and no material information has been withheld/suppressed. In case any of the above information is found to be false or untrue or misleading or misrepresenting, I/We are aware that I/We may be held liable for it. I/We understand that such information and documents shall be used and relied upon by Tejraj Micro Association for the purpose of sanctioning and granting the loan/credit facility (ies).

वाटप:- : कर्ज मंजूर झाल्यास, कर्जाच्या अंतर्गत किंवा त्यासंदर्भातील सर्व शुल्क (कागदपत्र आणि प्रक्रिया शुल्क किंवा कर्जाच्या कोणत्याही थकबाकीसह) कर्जाच्या रकमेतून वजा केले जातील आणि अश्या शुल्काच्या कपातीनानंतर कर्जाची निव्वळ रक्कम/शुल्क, थकबाकी कर्जाची रक्कम अर्जदाराला,अन्यथा सल्ला दिल्याखेरीज वितरित केली जाईल.

व्याज:-: दिलेल्या कर्जाचे मुद्दल आणि थकीत रकमेवर वेळोवेळी व्याज ,पक्षांद्वारे मान्य आणि कर्ज कागदपत्रांमध्ये नमूद केल्यानुसार आकारले जाईल. कर्जावरील व्याज हे प्रत्यक्ष दैनंदिन शिल्लक तत्वावर पाक्षिक/मासिक एका वर्षांतील दिवसांच्या आधारे काढले जाईल. कर्जावरील व्याज हे कर्ज वितरित केल्याच्या/कर्जाचा चेक जरी केल्याच्या दिवसापासून लागू होईल मग कर्जदार(रां)ने किंवा त्याच्या/तिच्या बँकेने चेक प्रप्त संकलित किंवा वटविणे यासाठी वेळ लागला तरीही कर्जाची रक्कम आणि व्याज पाक्षिक / मासिक हफ्तायामध्ये आणि ( तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन ) द्वारे सूचित केल्यानुसार अदा केली जाईल. व्याजाचा दर हा कर्ज रकमेची किंमत, तितकीच टेनर कॉस्ट , बाजारपेठेतील उपलब्धता , पुर्नवित मार्ग , स्पर्धकांच्या ऑफर्स , ग्राहक संबंधांचा कालावधी , वितरणाचा खर्च (कॉस्ट ऑफ फंड )यांचावर आधारित ठरवला जाईल. कॉस्ट ऑफ फंड च्या खेरीज , व्याजाचा दर ,उत्पादने आणि ग्राहकांच्या मते अंतर्भूत क्रेडिट आणि डिफॉल्ट जोखीमांवर आधारित ठरवेल जाईल जे ग्राहक सेगमेंट ग्राहकांचे प्रोफाईल , कुशल पात्रता, उत्पन्नतील स्थिरता आणि रोजगार आणि परतफेड क्षमता, एकंदर ग्राहक उत्पन्न , जोखीम प्रीमियम, प्रायमरी आणि कॉलॅटरल सिक्युरिटीजचे स्वरूप आणि मूल्य ग्राहकांच्या परतफेडीचा इतिहास, ग्राहकांचे बाह्य गुणांकन, उद्योगातील प्रवाह यांच्यातून उद्भवू शकतात. कंपनी व्याजदराचे मॉडेल स्वीकारू शकते ज्या द्वारे विविध ग्राहकांना एकाच कालावधीत घेतलेले तेच उत्पादन आणि अवधी पासून व्याजाचा दर प्रमाणित करण्याची आवश्यकता नाही. वरील घटकांपैकी कोणतेही किंवा संयोगाचा विचार करून त्या नुसार भिन्न ग्राहकांसाठी तो भिन्न असू शकतो.

  1. मी/आम्ही प्रमाणित करतो की वर दिलेली माहिती आणि दिलेली कागदपत्रे खरी आणि अचूक आहेत आणि कोणतीही महत्त्वाची माहिती लपवून ठेवली/दडवली गेली नाही. वरीलपैकी कोणतीही माहिती खोटी किंवा असत्य किंवा दिशाभूल करणारी किंवा चुकीची माहिती देणारी असल्याचे आढळल्यास, मला/आम्हाला याची जाणीव आहे की त्यासाठी मला/आम्हाला जबाबदार धरले जाऊ शकते. मी/आम्ही समजतो की अशी माहिती आणि दस्तऐवज (तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन) द्वारे कर्ज / क्रेडिट सुविधा मंजूर आणि मंजूर करण्याच्या हेतूने वापरल्या जातील आणि त्यावर अवलंबून राहतील.
  2. मी/आम्ही याद्वारे सांगतो की मी/आम्ही भारताचे नागरिक आहोत. मी/आम्ही अर्जाचा फॉर्म आणि माहितीपत्रके वाचली आहेत आणि मी/आम्ही अटी आणि शर्तींसह सामान्य व अटी व शर्तीबद्दल जागरूक आहोत जे कर्ज दस्तऐवजांचा अविभाज्य भाग असतील आणि असुरक्षित लाभ घेण्यासाठी इतर कर्ज/सुविधा दस्तऐवजांच्या सोबत वाचले जातील. असुरक्षित लाभ घेण्यासाठी इतर कर्ज/सुविधा दस्तऐवज हे तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन च्या नोंदणीकृत कार्यालय म्हणजे प्लॉट नंबर ७२ , गट नंबर १३०, अरुणोदय कॉलनी, बीड बाय पास रोड , दत्त मंदिराजवळ छत्रपती संभाजीनगर पिन कोड ४३१ ००१ येथे उपलब्ध करून दिलेले आहे. (समूह कर्ज करार नियंत्रित करणार्‍या अटी आणि नियम ज्यामध्ये तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन ने वेळोवेळी नमूद केलेल्या दुरुस्त्या आणि कोणत्याही अतिरिक्त अटींचा समावेश असेल).
  3. मी/आम्ही तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन यांना /यांचे सेवा प्रदाते, सल्लागार, क्रेडिट माहिती कंपन्या, माहिती उपयुक्तता, इतर बँका आणि वित्तीय संस्था, सहयोगी, समूह कंपन्या, उपकंपन्या, नियामक, तपास संस्था, न्यायिक, अर्ध न्यायिक, आणि वैधानिक संस्था यांना माहिती सामायिक करण्यास आणि उघड करण्यास स्पष्टपणे संमती देतो. अधिकारी,किंवा इतर व्यक्ती /संस्था /कंपनी याना कराराच्या किंवा कायदेशीर आवश्यकतांच्या संदर्भात किंवा तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनच्या कायदेशीर हितसंबंधात किंवा संमतीनुसार, माहितीवर प्रक्रिया करण्याचे काम हाती घेतील, ज्यात संग्रहित करणे , संरचना करणे , आयोजन करणे, पुनरुत्पादन, कॉपी करणे, वापरणे, प्रोफाइलिंग इ. तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन द्वारे योग्य मानले जाईल आणि क्रेडिट मूल्यांकन, फसवणूक शोध, मनी लाँडरिंग विरोधी दायित्वे, करारामध्ये प्रवेश करण्यासाठी, थेट विपणनासाठी , क्रॉस सेलिंगसाठी, क्रेडिट विकसित करण्यासाठी,स्कोअरिंग मॉडेल्स आणि व्यवसाय धोरणे, देखरेखीसाठी, सेवा आणि उत्पादनांच्या गुणवत्तेचे मूल्यांकन आणि सुधारणा करण्यासाठी किंवा कोणत्याही हेतूसाठी तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन योग्य वाटेल किंवा कोणतेही नियुक्त/संभाव्य नियुक्ती किंवा हस्तांतरित, ज्यांना आवश्यक वाटेल अशा पद्धतिने प्रकाशक/आरबीआयला आवश्यक वाटेल अशा माध्यमाद्वारे माहिती प्रकाशित करू शकेल , प्रक्रिया करेल आणि प्रकाशित करेल, ज्या मध्ये नाव प्रकाशित करणे समाविष्ट आहे. वेळोवेळी जाणीवपूर्वक कसूरदारांची यादी तसेच केवायसी माहिती पडताळणी, क्रेडीट जोखीम विश्लेषण किंवा इत्तर संबंधीत कारणांसाठी देखील वापरतात. मी / आम्ही याद्वारे तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनला नवीन उत्पादने आणि / किंवा सेवा, टॉप -अप कर्जासाठी / इ एम आय/इतर पायमेन्ट स्मरण पात्रांसाठी तृतीय पक्ष उत्पादने विकण्यासाठी फोन किंवा ई-मेल द्वारे माझ्याशी संपर्क साधण्यास आणि तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन चे कोणतेही नवीन ऑफेरिंग्स वापरण्यात मला मदत करण्यास सहमती देतो. या कर्ज अर्जाचा परिणाम विचारात न घेता ऑफर . मी/आम्ही गोपनीयता आणि कराराच्या गोपनीयतेचा विशेष अधिकार माफ करतो आणि असे प्रकटीकरन लागू असलेल्या कोणत्याही कायद्याचे , नियमाचे उल्लंघन करणार नाही . □ होय □ नाही
  4. मी/आम्ही पुष्टी करतो की कोणतीही दिवाळखोरी/समाप्तीची कार्यवाही किंवा माझ्या/आमच्या मालमत्तेची किंवा मालमत्ता जप्त करण्यासाठी किंवा माझ्या/आमच्या विरुद्ध फौजदारी कार्यवाही प्रलंबित नाही. आम्हाला कोणत्याही न्यायालय किंवा इतर प्राधिकरणाने कधीही दिवाळखोर ठरवले नाही.
  5. मी/आम्ही समजतो की कर्ज/क्रेडिट सुविधेची मंजुरी /अनुदान हे तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनच्या विवेकबुद्धीनुसार आहे आणि तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनला कोणतेही कारण न देता माझा/आमचा अर्ज नाकारण्याचा अधिकार असेल. पुढे, कर्जाचे वितरण आवश्यक कागदपत्रांची अंमलबजावणी, सुरक्षा अनामत प्रदान करणे आणि तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनद्वारे आवश्यक असलेल्या इतर औपचारिकता पूर्ण करण्याच्या अधीन असेल. मी/आम्ही पुढे सहमत आहोत की माझे/आमचे कर्ज/क्रेडिट सुविधा व्यवहार तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनच्या नियमांद्वारे नियंत्रित केले जातील, जे वेळोवेळी लागू होऊ शकतात.
  6. मी/आम्ही पुष्टी करतो की कर्ज/क्रेडिट सुविधा नमूद केलेल्या उद्देशासाठी वापरल्या जातील आणि कोणत्याही सट्टा किंवा असामाजिक हेतूसाठी वापरल्या जाणार नाहीत.
  7. मी/आम्ही माझ्या/आमच्या निवासी किंवा रोजगाराच्या पत्त्यातील कोणत्याही किंवा इतर KYC तपशीलांबाबत बदलाबाबत तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनला लेखी कळवण्याचे /अपडेट करण्याचे वचन घेतो . मी /आम्ही याद्वारे तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनद्वारे आवश्यकतेनुसार कोणतेही अतिरिक्त दस्तऐवज /कागदपत्रे सादर करण्याचे वचन देतो.
  8. कर्ज/क्रेडिट सुविधेंच्या अनुषंगाने या अर्जात दस्तऐवजीकरण केलेल्या अटी व शर्ती /करार व्यतिरिक्त कोणतेही सवलत किंवा मोफत भेट किंवा तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन किंवा तिच्या अधिकृत प्रतिनिधींपैकी (ने) मला /आम्हाला दिलेली कोणतेही वचनबद्धता नाही.
  9. मी/आम्ही या कर्जासाठी लागू असलेल्या अटी व शर्ती समजून घेतल्याची पुष्टी करतो आणि अटी व शर्ती बिनशर्त स्वीकारतो आणि सहमत आहोत की या अटी व शर्ती तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनद्वारे केव्हाही बदलल्या जाऊ शकतात आणि मी/आम्ही सुधारित अटी व शर्तीना बांधील असू .

  12. मी/आम्ही युनायटेड स्टेट्स ऑफ अमेरिका (यूएस) च्या कायद्यांतर्गत किंवा कोणतेही राज्य किंवा त्याचा वा तेथील राजकीय उपविभाग याचा ज्यामध्ये कोलंबिया किंवा अमिरेकीची इतर राज्य यांचा अमेरिका व्यक्ती म्हणून करपात्र अर्जदार नाही/नाही. पुढे, भारताबाहेरील काउंटरच्या कायद्यानुसार मी / आम्ही कर निवासी म्हणून करपात्र अर्जदार नाही. या फॉर्मवरील कोणतीही माहिती किंवा प्रमाणन चुकीचे असल्यास मी/आम्ही ३० दिवसाच्या आत नवीन फॉर्म सादर करण्यास सहमती देतो.
  13. मी/आम्ही याद्वारे घोषित करतो की, मी/आम्ही, डीएसए /चॅनल भागीदार/कलेक्टर एजन्ट म्हणून तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन सोबत संधी केलेली नाही.
  14. मी/आम्ही तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनला माझ्या/आमच्या केवाएसी ओव्हीडी/आधार क्रमांक/कर्ज किंवा सुविधा दस्तऐवजांची व्यवसायिक हेतूने डिजिटली / प्रत्यक्ष्यपणे त्रितियपक्ष एजन्सीद्वारे पडताळणी /प्रमाणीकरण करण्यास अधिकृत करतो मी/आम्ही याद्वारे तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन माझ्या / आमच्याशी कालांतराने केवाईसी पुनर्र केवाईसी नोंदी अद्यनित करण्यासाठी आणि लागू कायद्यानुसार वेळोवेळी या संदर्भात घोषणा प्राप्त करण्यासाठी माझ्याशी/आमच्याशी संपर्क साधण्यास संमती देतो.
  15. मी/आम्ही याद्वारे तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशनला माझी संमती देतो आणि UIDAI कडून माझे वैयक्तिक तपशील आणण्यासाठी अधिकृत करतो. मी/आम्ही याद्वारे सांगतो की मला/आम्हाला आधार आधारित प्रमाणीकरण प्रणालीद्वारे प्रमाणित करण्यात मला/ आमचा कोणताही आक्षेप नाही आणि मी/आम्ही स्वेच्छेने माझा/आमचा आधार क्रमांक व्हीआयडी क्रमांक, बायोमेट्रिक माहिती कर्ज अर्जाच्या उद्धेशाने डेटा (आणि किंवा तत्सम प्रमाणीकरण डेटा )आणि/किंवा वन टाइम पिन (ओटीपी) डेटा प्रदान करण्यास सहमती देतो. मी/आम्ही समजतो कि मला आम्हाला प्रामाणिकरण्यासाठी प्रदान केलेला बायोमेट्रिक आणि/किंवा ओटीपी आणि/किंवा मी/आम्ही प्रमाणीकरणासाठी प्रदान केलेला कोणताही प्रमाणीकरण डेटा विशिष्ट व्यवहारासाठी आधार प्रमाणीकरण प्रणालीद्वारे माझी ओळख प्रमाणित करण्यासाठी किंवा कायद्याच्या आवश्यकतेनुसार आणि त्यासाठी वापरला जाईल. मी/आम्ही पुष्टी करतो की मला/आम्हाला कळवण्यात आले आहे की आम्ही ओळख माहिती सादर करण्याच्या पर्यांबद्दल माहिती देण्यात आली आहे मी / आम्ही माहिती ओळख सादर करण्याच्या पर्यायांची संपूर्ण माहिती घेऊन आधार आधारित प्रमाणीकरण प्रणालीद्वारे स्वतःचे / आम्हाला प्रमाणीकरण करण्यास सहमती दर्शवली आहे, ईतर कोणतेही प्रयोजन नाही. मी / आम्ही समजतो की तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन आधार आधारित प्रामाणिकरण्याच्या उद्देशाने प्रदान केलेल्या माझ्या वैयक्तिक ओळख माहितीची सुरक्षा आणि गोपनीयता सुनिश्चित करेल. मी / आम्ही तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन ला माझ्या (उत्पादन) कर्जावर प्रक्रिया करताना माझे / आमचे आधार सत्यपित आणि प्रमाणीकृत करण्यासाठी आधिकृत करतो. मी/ आम्ही तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन यापुढे माझा / आमच्या आधाराशी संबंधित तपशील / माहिती नियामक / वैधानिक संस्थांबरोबर आवश्यकतेनुसार देण्यास करण्यासाठी अधिकृत करतो.

  18. मी/आम्ही सहमत आहोत आणि समजतो की विमा आणि किंवा कोणतीही तृतीय पक्ष उत्पादने याखालील कर्जाचा अर्ज आणि वितरणाच्या उद्देशासाठी अनिवार्य नाहीत. असा विमा आणि/किंवा कर्ज अर्जासोबत मिळणाऱ्या कोणत्याही तृतीय पक्ष उत्पादनांचा लाभ घेणे हा ग्राहकांचा संपूर्ण विवेक असेल. मी/आम्ही याद्वारे तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन ला माझ्या तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन कडे असलेल्या कर्जाच्या समक्ष विमा कंपनीकडून कोणत्याही परतावा / पेमेंट चे दाव्यावर (जे वर्णन केले आहे) समायोजन करण्यासाठी माझी संमती देतो
  19. मी/आम्ही पुष्टी करतो की माझ्या / आमच्याकडून या कर्ज अर्जासोबत किंवा त्या संबंधात रोख, वाहक धनादेश किंवा कोणतेही प्रकारचे पेमेंट माझ्याकडून / आमच्याकडून गोळा करण्यात आले नाही आणि मी /आम्ही चेकलिस्टमध्ये सूचिबद्ध केलेल्या कागदपत्रांच्या स्वयं-साक्षांकित प्रति सादर केल्या आहेत.

पती/पत्नी {{ nominee_doc.member_name or "____________________________________" }} (जोडीदाराचे नाव) तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन (या पुढे कंपनीचा उल्लेख एम पी एच ) कडून कर्जाचा लाभ घेतला आहे. काही अघटित घटना घडल्यास, त्या कर्जाच्या सुरणाक्षतेसाठी, मी माझी नोंदणी एम पी एच द्वारा संचलित गट विमा योजनेत केली आहे. माझी अशी इच्छा आहे कि, माझ्या बाबतीत काही अघटित घटना घडली तर, दावा उधभवू शकतो, अश्या वेळी मी एस बीआय लाईफ इन्सुरन्स कंपनी लिमिटेड कंपनीलाला अधिकार देतो कि, कर्जाची तेव्हा असलेली बाकी रक्कम तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन अदा करावी, रक्कम अदा केल्यावर, दाव्याची रक्कम जर उरली तर, परिस्थितीनुसार एस बीआय लाईफ इन्सुरन्स कंपनी लिमिटेड माझ्या वारसाला / लाभार्थीला द्यावी.

एम पी एच संचालित गट विमा योजनेअंतर्गत मी सभासद असताना घटनेमुळे दावा आला तर, एस बीआय लाईफ इन्सुरन्स कंपनी लिमिटेड ने त्यावेळच्या शिल्लक कर्जाएवढी रक्कम एम पी एच कंपनीला सुपूर्द करावी. वरील प्रतिज्ञापत्रात काही बदल करायचा असल्यास, एस बीआय लाईफ इन्सुरन्स कंपनी लिमिटेड ते निदर्शनास आणून देण्याची जबाबदारी सर्वस्वी माझी असेल.

तेजराज मायक्रो असोसिएशन कंपनीच्या प्रतिनिधीने या अर्जातील मजकूर मला समजेल अश्या भाषेत समजावून सांगितला आहे आणि मला हा मजकूर समजला आहे आणि मला तो मान्य आहे.
